footer.DESCRIPTION: The best directory website template for showcasing your projects, tools, and resources with style and functionality.
footer.DISCLAIMER: All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this repository, related repositories, and associated websites are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement, affiliation, or sponsorship. This directory may include content generated by artificial intelligence (AI)

CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change Your Password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Choose a strong password that you haven't used elsewhere. We'll send you a confirmation email once your password is changed.

SECURITY_TIPS.TITLE: Security Tips
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_1: Use a unique password that you don't use for other accounts
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_2: Include a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_3: Consider enabling two-factor authentication for extra security
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_4: Regularly review your login activity and active sessions

CHANGE_PASSWORD_FORM.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.

VALIDATION.MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
VALIDATION.UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
VALIDATION.LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
VALIDATION.NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character

help.HERO_SUBTITLE: The most complete directory boilerplate, enhanced with AI and packed with all the essential features: listings, payments, submissions, CMS, blog, authentication, newsletter, SEO, themes, and more.
help.HERO_FEATURE_1_DESC: Streamlined content organization and automated workflows
help.HERO_FEATURE_2_DESC: Modern, responsive layouts that convert visitors
help.HERO_FEATURE_3_DESC: Built-in monetization tools for sustainable growth
help.HERO_DEMO_DESCRIPTION: Experience the power of modern directory solutions
help.HERO_SUBTITLE_FEATURES: and everything you need to build a successful directory platform.

help.TECH_NEXTJS_DESC: React framework for building directory platforms with server-side rendering
help.TECH_TYPESCRIPT_DESC: Type-safe JavaScript for building robust directory applications
help.TECH_TAILWIND_DESC: Utility-first CSS framework for styling your directory interface
help.TECH_SUPABASE_DESC: Open-source backend for directory data storage and authentication - perfectly integrated with our GitHub-native approach
help.TECH_HEROUI_DESC: Modern React UI library with beautiful components for building directory interfaces
help.TECH_NEXTAUTH_DESC: Complete authentication solution for Next.js applications with multiple provider support
help.TECH_DRIZZLE_DESC: TypeScript ORM for SQL databases with excellent developer experience and type safety
help.TECH_TANSTACK_DESC: Powerful data synchronization library for React applications with caching and background updates
help.TECH_STRIPE_DESC: Complete payment processing platform for handling subscriptions and one-time payments
help.TECH_RESEND_DESC: Modern email API for developers with excellent deliverability and simple integration
help.TECH_SENTRY_DESC: Application monitoring and error tracking platform for production applications
help.TECH_FRAMER_DESC: Production-ready motion library for React with declarative animations and gestures
help.TECH_ZUSTAND_DESC: Small, fast, and scalable state management solution for React applications
help.TECH_ZOD_DESC: TypeScript-first schema validation library with static type inference
help.TECH_POSTHOG_DESC: Open-source product analytics platform for tracking user behavior and feature usage
help.TECH_VERCEL_DESC: Frontend cloud platform for deploying and hosting modern web applications
help.BENEFITS_FAST_DESC: Get your directory platform running in under 10 minutes

help.BENEFITS_MOBILE_DESC: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices
help.BENEFITS_CUSTOMIZABLE_DESC: Easy to customize with themes, layouts, and directory-specific features
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: Build Your Directory in 3 Simple Steps
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_DESCRIPTION: Follow our streamlined process to create a professional directory platform that's ready to accept submissions and generate revenue.
help.TECH_STACK_SUBTITLE: Industry-standard technologies optimized for building scalable directory platforms
help.ENV_CONFIG_DESC: Set up the essential environment variables needed to run your directory platform securely and efficiently
help.ENV_CONFIG_LOCAL_DEV_DESC: Set up your local development environment
help.ENV_CONFIG_NEED_HELP_DESC: Our support team is here to help you configure your directory platform correctly
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME: How long does it take to build a directory?
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME_ANSWER: With our directory builder, you can have a professional directory running in under 10 minutes.
help.FAQ_CODING_EXPERIENCE_ANSWER: No coding required! Our open-source, AI-powered directory builder makes it easy for anyone to create professional directories. Free template, GitHub-native, SaaS optional.
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN: Can I customize my directory design?
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN_ANSWER: Yes! Ever Works offers extensive customization options with multiple themes and layouts for your directory.
help.FAQ_HOSTING: Where can I host my directory?
help.FAQ_HOSTING_ANSWER: We recommend Vercel for the best performance, but your directory works with any Node.js hosting provider.
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION: How do I integrate payment processing?
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION_ANSWER: Our directory platform comes with pre-configured Stripe integration. Simply add your API keys in the environment variables and the payment system will be ready for premium listings.
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN: Can I use my own domain?
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_ANSWER: Yes! You can easily connect your custom domain to your directory. We provide step-by-step instructions for domain configuration with popular providers.

billing.SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLING_DESCRIPTION: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current billing period. You can reactivate it anytime before then.
